verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* therefore, \w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* speeches, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* within \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w jaws|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w My|strong="H1847"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w from|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H1847"\w* \w upright|strong="H3476"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H1847"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w speak|strong="H8193"\w* a \w pure|strong="H1305"\w* sentence.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H2421"\w*, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H2421"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou canst, \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w up|strong="H6186"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w made|strong="H1571"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* same clay \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* \w formed|strong="H7169"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H5921"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wonder \w terrify|strong="H1204"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3513"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* eloquence \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w burdensome|strong="H3513"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w Now|strong="H8085"\w* thou \w has|strong="H0241"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* thy \w words|strong="H4405"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w clean|strong="H2134"\w*, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w sin|strong="H5771"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* unspotted, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w there|strong="H1097"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath \w found|strong="H4672"\w* complaints \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, therefore \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7272"\w* hath \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w in|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stocks|strong="H5465"\w*, \w he|strong="H7272"\w* hath \w observed|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H0433"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w thing|strong="H2063"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* which thou art \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w is|strong="H0433"\w* \w greater|strong="H7235"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w*.

Dost thou \w strive|strong="H7378"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*?

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* speaketh \w once|strong="H0259"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* repeateth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* selfsame \w thing|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w time|strong="H8147"\w*.

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w vision|strong="H2384"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w* falleth \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w sleeping|strong="H4904"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w beds|strong="H4904"\w*:

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* \w he|strong="H0227"\w* openeth \w the|strong="H0227"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* teaching instructeth \w them|strong="H1540"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* what \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* learn.

That \w he|strong="H0120"\w* \w may|strong="H0120"\w* withdraw \w a|strong="H3680"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w things|strong="H4639"\w* \w he|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H4639"\w* doing, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w may|strong="H0120"\w* deliver him \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w pride|strong="H1466"\w*.

Rescuing \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w corruption|strong="H7845"\w*: \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w passing|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* sword.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* rebuketh also \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, \w and|strong="H7379"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* maketh all \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* wither.

\w Bread|strong="H3899"\w* becometh abominable \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w him|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* the meat \w which|strong="H3899"\w* before \w he|strong="H8378"\w* \w desired|strong="H8378"\w*.

\w His|strong="H7200"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* \w away|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* were covered \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* made \w bare|strong="H8205"\w*.

\w His|strong="H7126"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath \w drawn|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w corruption|strong="H7845"\w*, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* destroyers.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* speaking \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w manâ€™s|strong="H0120"\w* \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w*,

\w He|strong="H0559"\w* shall \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H3381"\w*, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Deliver|strong="H6308"\w* \w him|strong="H3381"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* may not \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w corruption|strong="H7845"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* wherein \w I|strong="H0559"\w* may be merciful \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w His|strong="H7725"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* consumed \w with|strong="H3117"\w* punishment, let \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w youth|strong="H5290"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w pray|strong="H6279"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H6666"\w* \w be|strong="H0582"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w joy|strong="H8643"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H6666"\w* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w look|strong="H7789"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w offended|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w received|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H3477"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* deserved.

\w He|strong="H7200"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H6299"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* going \w into|strong="H7200"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7845"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* worketh \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w within|strong="H5973"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w That|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w withdraw|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w corruption|strong="H7845"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w enlighten|strong="H0215"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

Attend, \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*: \w and|strong="H8085"\w* hold thy peace, whilst \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou hast \w any|strong="H3426"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3426"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* thee \w to|strong="H1696"\w* appear \w just|strong="H6663"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H0859"\w*: hold thy peace, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0369"\w* \w teach|strong="H0502"\w* thee \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.
